name: Tiny Gatherer
description:
Tiny Gatherer is small logical game written in 24 hours, that has roots in roguelike genre. Gameplay is simple and very fast paced.

Player starts on small board, with certain amount of time to gather as much treasures as possible. Every step costs some amount of time - brighter floor are faster to cross, darker - slower. Find optimal route and become rich!

Latest release is original 24H version with display fixes and balance tweaks.

Current features:

  • fast paced gameplay
  • 3 controls schemes
  • 5 types of environment
  • easy to expand open source model

After polishing 24H release, I'd want to add high scores list and different game modes.
